title: riot, is this a real thing, cuz i did it and now i cant log onto my main :P
body: my main account was Nightmareeeeeeee but now i cant seem to log on anymore, but i can log onto this account fine and im thinking something is up

replies.body: one of my friends has sent this to me just now, i am not going to click it, id rather earn my skins then potentially lose my account.
